summary: SummaryMario Badescu's Enzyme Cleansing Gel is a universal, best-selling face wash. This Papaya and Grapefruit-infused formula removes excess oil and dulls surface impurities to rejuvenate the complexion - leaving skin fresh-faced and bright.
details: DetailsBenefitsOil-freeRefreshing gel cleanser - a top-selling universal favoriteRemoves light makeup, excess oil, and surface impuritiesLeaves skin bright and refreshedItem 2209927How To UseGently massage cleanser in circular motions on wet skin, then rinse thoroughly with warm water. Be sure to follow with an appropriate toner and moisturizer. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.IngredientsAqua (Water, Eau), Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, PEG-8 Stearate, PPG-2 Hydroxyethyl Cocamide, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Carbomer, Sodium Chloride, Parfum (Fragrance), Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Triethanolamine, Diazolidinyl Urea, Mica, CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 19140 (Yellow 5), CI 42090 (Blue 1), CI 15985 (Yellow 6).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently massage cleanser in circular motions on wet skin, then rinse thoroughly with warm water. Be sure to follow with an appropriate toner and moisturizer. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.

reviews.headline: Spa experience
reviews.comments: I use this cleanser every night with a silicone brush and it is so relaxing and reviving! It keeps my skin clear and brightens my complexion. I highly reccomend this product!

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this product. I look forward to using it every night. Absolutely love the smell, it is so relaxing! It is one product ive found that uses papaya extract, which is a good lightening ingredient. Please never stop making/selling this product!

reviews.headline: Find Another Face Wash
reviews.comments: I was excited to finally try a Mario Badescu product. However, I was very disappointed with this product. It was very ineffective for removing makeup. After the first wash, I looked like a racoon around my eyes. Instead of removing and washing away, the face gel basically smeared the makeup. The fragrance is pretty strong than most facial washes. You don't need a lot to use, which means it's taking me longer to get through this bottle. I will not purchase/recommend this product.

reviews.headline: Very Nice Cleanser
reviews.comments:
After many years of not trying this cleanser, I finally purchased it. It's pleasant to use and my face feels clean afterwards, albeit a little dry.

Still and all I'm happy with the purchase.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I love this cleanser. I think some people commented they don't like the smell and I love it, so that was a nice surprise. I apply to wet skin and try to leave it on for at least two minutes and if I want extra exfoliation, I will add some scrub when I am removing. I have pretty tough skin and can use this every day. And because it is a thick gel, I'm not worried about it leaking when traveling, an added bonus.

reviews.headline: My Holy Grail
reviews.comments: This has been my #1 cleanser since high school for good reason. It's smooth, it cleanses well without feeling dry, and it mever fails to calm breakouts I might get. There's a few natural AHAs in there and i think that's what makes it so good at clearing my skin. Only thing of note is that it cannot be used on eyes or to remove makeup, but its no problem grabbing my micellar water before i start using this!

reviews.headline: Feels very silky on the skin
reviews.comments: I've been using this for a week now, and while I wasn't sure about it the first couple times I washed my face, I feel like it's gotten better with use. It feels very lovely going on, and after a couple days my skin has started to feel softer and the scaly upper midwest winter skin that's been troubling me has gone. The aesthetician who helped me pick this out advised me to let it sit for two minutes on my skin in the evenings to let the enzymes work as she thought my skin was too sensitive for any kind of exfoliating product, I think that's really done the trick. I don't mind the scent, but other people may be put off by it.

reviews.headline: A basic for daily regimen
reviews.comments: I have been using this cleanser for years ( believe it or not Martha Stewart recommended it way back). It is very gentle and at my age need that but it doesnt remove make up well enough for me ( though i wear much lighter make up now - quite frankly my skin looks better the older i get). This is the cleanser i use in the morning to freshen my skin and remove any extra nighttime  oil/ treatments. I use Gentle Foaming cleanser in the evening for make up removal and Glycolic Acid Toner both morning and night. Mario Badescu products will not fail you , are at a reasonable price point  and very effective once you find what works for you. I am very happy with their fairly new Clarifying serum IF i feel i'm starting to get a blemish ( which ive managed my entire life). It's magic and gentle!

reviews.headline: Made my skin worse
reviews.comments: I have senstive, combination skin that is acne-prone. I use a couple other Mario Badescu products and was just using Dr. Bronners tea tree or peppermint for my face and body before. Within a few weeks, my skin was the oiliest it's been in years and was constantly breaking out again. As soon as I stopped and went back to Dr. Bronners, my skin went back to normal and calmed back down.

reviews.headline: Break out
reviews.comments: After using this product i broke out bad ! Its terrible for dry acne prone skin.  I have a rash and pimple on my jaw and check because of this product!

reviews.headline: Bright Face
reviews.comments: Love this cleanser. Its smooth, leaves skin hydrating and glowy. Definitely recommend.

reviews.headline: Not Happy
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this cleanser but I don't. Nice scent, lathers well but just doesn't cut through my makeup. I have to wash my face 2-3 times to get everything off and I don't wear that much!

reviews.headline: Love this face wash
reviews.comments: I love this face wash, gentle and cleans my face. The scent took about a day to get use to, but now I like this scent and am not use to another scent.

reviews.headline: Better than...
reviews.comments:
On the search for a good papaya-enzyme cleanser (more natural than 'Likas Papaya' soap which works well but isn't all that great for the skin's PH) and stumbled upon this. The concentration of Papaya in here isn't anywhere near as strong as Likas' soap but it does contain a natural AHA (Grapefruit extract) which would (hopefully) make up for it! Or would it? It works fairly well as a cleanser, although not as good at removing makeup as it's touted to be, had to double-cleanse on all days when trying to remove anything more than oil-free foundation. The fragrance is very strong which isn't a good thing in my books, and as the instructions state: leaving on for 1-2 minutes if you can, is worth doing, as the difference when doing so, compared to when I didn't, could be noticed immediately (smoother, brighter, more refined skin). All in all a fairly good cleanser, not as effective when it comes to brightening as Likas Papaya (despite the addition of that Graperfuit) but an acceptable alternative, considering it's not a bar of skin-stripping soap!
-> My 'Ulta Beauty Top 7 must-have list' (My 7 favorite beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Ulta) < - < 1. Hair Loss Treatment: Divine Herbal Hair Oil < 2. Eye Cream: Clinique All about eyes < 3. Lip Gloss: Clarins Lip Comfort Oil < 4. Makeup Remover: Lancome Bi Facil < 5. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: Divine Herbal Facial Treatment Serum < 6. Eyeliner: Ulta Beauty Gel Eyeliner Pencil < 7. Moisturizer: 'Lush' â€“ Enzymion

reviews.headline: 8 years strong
reviews.comments: As said in headline , 8 yrs with this product . If you see this Mario never change the formula ! Ill never forgive if you do !!! I used to use bliss before they changed the formula and thats what prompted for a change of product . This enzyme cleanser has been good to me ! I never break out unless aunt flow comes or i wear make up. I always notice a difference when i wash my face after a long day of work . I pray they never change the formula !

reviews.headline: My favorite
reviews.comments: My favorite facial cleanser. It doesn't lather, so you only need a little bit. It works well with me because I have hyperpigmentation. It dries up the scar and falls off like dry skin. This is my 4th bottle.

reviews.headline: Perfect for the shower
reviews.comments: I don't use this to remove makeup, as there are better options. However, it IS perfect for washing your face in the shower. I have rotated thru various samples for use during my showers as I'm not attempting to remove heavy eye makeup or anything like that. This is the first sample that made a noticeable difference in my skin clarity and brightness, and I only use it during my normal showers. So I bought a full size bottle. It's doesn't smell the greatest, and it doesn't lather. But I'm fine with that if it keeps my skin looking bright and clear.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: Not for me. Made my face extra dry

reviews.headline: a staple
reviews.comments: i've been buying this over and over for about 5 years now. it leaves my skin feeling super soft and never breaks me out. a little goes a very long way

reviews.headline: So worth it!
reviews.comments: I have normal to dry skin and have been using this gel for about 5 years now. It works so well for my skin and even though sometimes I take a break from it to experiment with other brands I always come back to it. It always leaves my face feeling so clean and fresh. I absolutely recommend it.

media.headline: I absolutely LOVE this facial cleanser!
I am in Love with this Cleanser
I won't use anything else on my face
Omg this product is heaven in a bottle glad I got it On sale
Only have used a few times, but it doesn't lather
Have used this product faithfully for three years, love it!
media.caption: Love my skin!

faceoff_positive.comments:
This is a good cleanser, but it is not the best that I have used.  I have combination/oily skin for most of the year and normal to dry-combination in the heart of the winter.  I bought this product at the beginning of February 2013, and I have used it every morning and night.  It is non-irritating and does not leave the skin with a tight, stripped feeling.  It works especially well as a morning cleanser when I'm just washing away any sweat / oil production from the night and don't have any makeup to remove.  The issue that I have  with this product is that at night, even if I use a makeup wipe before cleansing my face, I feel that all this product does is remove the residual makeup.  Often times, I'll have to wash my face twice just to feel like the product has penetrated through to my skin.  

I will say that this product worked better for my skin in the winter/early spring months than it did throughout the summer.  It could be because my skin type changed or it could be that my skin built up some kind of tolerance to it.  I would definitely give it a shot as it has not caused any bad side effects for me... I just don't think it's the best product for my personal skin care needs. [On a side note--I have recently switched to Philosophy's purity and it seems to be better at getting my combo skin truly clean]

I'm torn between giving this product 3 and 4 stars, but I have gone with 4 because the product is well-priced.
faceoff_positive.headline: Okay cleanser, better products out there

faceoff_negative.comments: I never write reviews. However, I read them religiously to determine if I'm going to buy something so I wanted to share. I do not have sensitive skin and I never break out using new products. I have mostly clear skin with the occasional breakout. I have the seaweed cleanser and this one was on sale so I decided to give it a try last night. This morning, the entire bottom of my face/jaw/chin is broken out in a red, heated, itchy rash (it's as gross as it sounds). I'm hoping with discontinued use that it will go away but I'm struggling to even cover it with makeup. I will never buy this product again and be very cautious with this brand in the future.
faceoff_negative.headline: One Use - Rash
